select count(1) from t_meeting_hotel t left join t_hotel h on t.hotel_id = h.id where t.meeting_id =#{meetingHotel.meetingId} and t.deleted =0
AND t.fee_name like CONCAT('%',#{meetingHotel.feeName},'%')
AND h.hotel_name like CONCAT('%',#{meetingHotel.hotelName},'%')
AND t.fee_type = #{meetingHotel.feeType}

select t.*,h.hotel_name from t_meeting_hotel t left join t_hotel h on t.hotel_id = h.id where t.meeting_id = #{meetingHotel.meetingId} and t.deleted =0
AND t.fee_name like CONCAT('%',#{meetingHotel.feeName},'%')
AND h.hotel_name like CONCAT('%',#{meetingHotel.hotelName},'%')
AND t.fee_type = #{meetingHotel.feeType}
order by t.create_time desc
